title: AI-Driven Novel Generation Systems: Unfolding the Narrative Journey
description: An inside look into the architecture and process of AI-driven systems for generating novels, from conception to a ready-to-publish EPUB format.

title: Big Compute
description: Exploring the monumental growth of computational power, the concept of 'people of compute', and the future of GPUs in terms of PFLOPS and energy efficiency.

title: A Person of Compute
description: Delving into computational power, conceptualizing 'people of compute', and the advancements in GPU capabilities with a focus on PFLOPS and energy efficiency.
author: You
